certifications.description: Mastery of object-oriented programming principles such as encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, and abstraction in C++. Familiarity with the Standard Template Library (STL) in C++, including containers (e.g., vectors, lists, maps), algorithms (e.g., sorting, searching), and iterators.
certifications.title: C++ essential learning

certifications.description: Proficiency in Object-Oriented Principles: Mastery of fundamental OOP concepts such as encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, and abstraction. Design Patterns: Comprehensive understanding and application of various design patterns (e.g., Singleton, Factory, Observer) to solve common software design challenges efficiently.
certifications.title: Object oriented design foundation

projects.name: Reels Clone Website
projects.description: A project with industry-level tech stacks. Developed a clone of a reels website, resembling platforms like Instagrams Reels, offering users a platform to discover, upload, and engage with short video content. Led the development of key features such as user authentication, video upload, and the video feed. Building a Full Stack App helps me to learn about MERN Stack as well as NextJs.

projects.name: WanderLust
projects.description: A project with industry-level tech stacks. Developed a full-stack website where you can upload your room for rent. Led the development of key features such as accommodation search, property listings. Enhanced proficiency in full-stack development, particularly in frontend technologies like React.js and backend technologies like Node.js.

experiences.description: I worked alot on Github also along with development. Here I Learned something which was new to me that was about Web Scrapping. Facilitated mentorship programs with Engineers from MIVS softwares, gaining practical insights into software development practices and scalability principles, enhancing my expertise in real-world application development.
I worked here as front-end web developer. I build various projects here that basically boosted my knowledge and also enhanced my experience.
